enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for RTVF Majors who are Sophomores, Juniors, Seniors
title: SoC RTVF 479-0-21 Seminar: Studies in Film and Video Prod

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Learning objectives: This course focuses primarily on audio recording outside of the studio environment and introductory digital audio processing within Pro Tools. We will learn methods and technologies of field recording through a series of demonstrations, hands-on experiences, and assignments. The audio collected in these assignments will become the subject of Pro Tools projects designed to explore the most relevant aspects of the software for documentary audio production.



Evaluation method: Class participation, partnered collaboration, readings, field recording & sound mixing assignments.



Class materials: A portable hard drive with 250 gig of free space.



Class notes: Registration is reserved for Documentary Media MFA Students.

subject: RTVF
